code: @Override protected int poll() throws Exception {     Exchange exchange = super.getEndpoint().createExchange().     try {         log.trace("Getting the blob content").         getBlob(exchange).         super.getAsyncProcessor().process(exchange).         return 1.     } catch (StorageException ex) {         if (404 == ex.getHttpStatusCode()) {             return 0.         } else {             throw ex.         }     } }
private void getBlob(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     BlobServiceUtil.getBlob(exchange, getConfiguration()). }
